transcript:
when you change and when you decide to
change is where you're going to find the
most resistance so what you should do is
identify three to small three to five
small habits that you need to change and
then identify them and start putting
them into your day and start becoming
that person and you're not going to be
better tomorrow but you'll be a little
teeny tiny bit better you're not going
to be a complete different person but
you'll be a little bit better start
focusing on just becoming a little bit
better every single day fast forward
years from now you'll be a completely
different person a completely different
life and you'll be excited that you took
the actions you needed to to change your
life
